DocAttribute.Name: Side
DocAttribute.Documentation: An indication of which side of the surface to apply the style.

DocAttribute.Name: Styles
DocAttribute.Documentation: A collection of different surface styles.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Each select item of _IfcSurfaceStyleSelect_ within the _Styles_ shall only be used maximum once.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR12
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcSurfaceStyleLighting_ shall only be used zero or one time within the set of _Styles_.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR13
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcSurfaceStyleRefraction_ shall only be used zero or one time within the set of _Styles_.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR14
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcSurfaceStyleWithTextures_ shall only be used zero or one time within the set of _Styles_.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR15
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcExternallyDefinedSurfaceStyle_ shall only be used zero or one time within the set of _Styles_.
